name: REVIVE THERAPEUTICS INC.
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for acceleration and approval of bucillamine as a COVID-19 critical therapeutic solution. In addition, advocating for TBI, PTSD applications of other medicines in development.
Advocating for assistance w/Phase 3 trial for Bucillamine
Advocating for assistance w/Phase 3 trial for Bucillamine, educating Members of Congress, BARDA/HHS and NIH regarding Bucillamine as a repurposed drug for COVID19.
